availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Latham (Bath County, KY, farmer; Fleming Co native)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Fleming County, Kentucky, native. Married to Phebe Ellen Hart Latham. Father of Mary E. Latham, John Latham, George Latham, Josiah B. Latham, Sally Latham, Anne E. Latham, William Latham. Farmer in Bath County in 1850. Farmer in Bath County in 1860. Farmer in Bath County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, District 1, p. 61A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 54.
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1965), KDLA,Film 7020650: All Counties, Bath County, 1942-1943, File # 25794, p. 1805 of 3519 of microfilm.
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 15, Bath County, Kentucky, 1866, p.7, p. 237 of 314 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, “George Lathram (1828-1907)," Memorial # 193530468, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/193530468/george-lathram (accessed January 11, 2021).
